Why choose Voyager

Voyager specializes in personalized transportation experiences. Our team carrying years of experience ensures every journey is seamless and memorable, tailored just for you.

About us

  • Versatile Fleet

    Custom rides from compact to colossal, with all your favorite extras.

  • Cost-Effective

    Budget-friendly experience that’s worth every penny.

  • 24/7 Customer Support

    Always on call, because your peace of mind is our top priority!

  • Absolute Safety

    Travel without a care—safety and smiles in every mile.

  • Revolutionary Technology

    Experience the simplicity of booking—just a few clicks to your perfect ride.

  • Voyager Pass

1/3

Technologies

Voyager

The Voyager App is designed to streamline the booking process and minimize the hassle of endless emails, giving you greater control over your bus trips.
Explore more

2/3

Technologies

Voyager Business

Advanced shuttle management system for organizations of any size. Through our sophisticated platform, you can procure buses, track payments, and manage riders, all under one platform.
Explore more

3/3

Technologies

Voyager School

A groundbreaking platform for student transportation that incorporates electric buses and vehicles, delivering the contemporary amenities desired by parents, students, drivers, and schools.
Explore more

Voyager Member

At HopOn, we are excited to announce our exclusive partnership with Voyager’s Club. As a Voyager Member, we are part of a distinguished network that emphasizes excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction in travel and transport services.

Become a member

Our blog

Explore and learn more about
our incredible products

  • 26 June, 2024

    Exploring Washington, D.C.: Your Ultimate Guide to Charter Bus Rentals

    Washington, D.C., the capital of the United States, is a treasure trove of historical landmarks, cultural institutions, and political powerhouses. From the majestic Lincoln Memorial to the bustling corridors of the Smithsonian museums, there’s no shortage of things to see and do. Navigating this vibrant city can be overwhelming, especially for large groups. That’s where Voyager, your premier charter bus rental service, comes into play. Let’s explore why renting a charter bus is the ultimate way to experience Washington, D.C., and how Voyager can make your trip unforgettable.

  • 26 June, 2024

    Discover the Best of D.C. with Charter Bus Rentals: A Comprehensive Itinerary

    Welcome to Washington, D.C., a city that embodies the essence of American history, culture, and politics. From the monumental grandeur of the National Mall to the charming streets of Georgetown, D.C. offers an array of experiences for every traveler. Whether you’re a school group, a corporate team, or a family reunion, navigating the city can be overwhelming. That’s where Voyager, your premier charter bus rental service, comes into play. With our comfortable, convenient, and affordable transportation, exploring D.C. has never been easier. Here’s a comprehensive itinerary to help you discover the best of the nation’s capital.

  • 26 June, 2024

    Washington, D.C. Adventures Made Simple: Group Travel with Charter Bus Rentals

    Washington, D.C., the capital of the United States, is a city brimming with history, culture, and political significance. From the iconic landmarks on the National Mall to the vibrant neighborhoods teeming with unique experiences, there’s no shortage of things to see and do. However, navigating this bustling metropolis, especially with a group, can be daunting. That’s where Voyager, your premier charter bus rental service, steps in to transform your D.C. adventure into a seamless, stress-free experience.
